about_the_game:
Funny Bunny Gun is a Metroidvania platformer in a cartoon style, featuring an adventure of a rabbit warrior Pooh.
Giant murderous vegetables and mutant beetles threaten the peaceful life of forest dwellers. These monsters come from the laboratory of the mad scientist, dr. Zlatous. It looks like it's time for Pooh to take up the superhero mantle, a super-ultra gun, and become the greatest warrior of this world!

Each new area of this world has a unique style, inhabitants, and characters. You will visit deadly fiery volcanoes and icy frozen mazes. Walking through a green forest, you may find a dark cave illuminated by glimmering magical crystals. There you will encounter worker moles digging around, building their bizarre dwellings. The diversity of this fantastic world will wake up your inner explorer!

Remain observant! Get off the beaten track to find secret spots and all sorts of things useful for your adventure. You may find ancient vaults or new routes in previously explored locations.

Improve your super-ultra guns to beat difficult enemies and destroy the lab of dr. Zlatous. The talent tree allows you to adjust the gameplay according to your needs and preferences. Engage in melee or strike foes down from afar? Or maybe you want to use traps instead? Your choice.
Every region has a Warden, its mind corrupted by the mad scientist. Fighting such a creature may prove challenging.

  • Colorful cartoon style.
  • A variety of unique Metroidvania-style locations.
  • Charismatic characters and enemies won't keep you bored.
  • A variety of super-ultra guns with unique special attacks.
  • Alternative fire modes and gun upgrades.
  • Various abilities for your hero will prove helpful in your adventure.
  • Each location has bosses and mini-bosses.
  • Many secrets, hidden treasures, and other useful things around the world.
detailed_description:
SEE ALSO OUR NEW GAME!



About the Game



Funny Bunny Gun is a Metroidvania platformer in a cartoon style, featuring an adventure of a rabbit warrior Pooh.
Giant murderous vegetables and mutant beetles threaten the peaceful life of forest dwellers. These monsters come from the laboratory of the mad scientist, dr. Zlatous. It looks like it's time for Pooh to take up the superhero mantle, a super-ultra gun, and become the greatest warrior of this world!

Each new area of this world has a unique style, inhabitants, and characters. You will visit deadly fiery volcanoes and icy frozen mazes. Walking through a green forest, you may find a dark cave illuminated by glimmering magical crystals. There you will encounter worker moles digging around, building their bizarre dwellings. The diversity of this fantastic world will wake up your inner explorer!

Remain observant! Get off the beaten track to find secret spots and all sorts of things useful for your adventure. You may find ancient vaults or new routes in previously explored locations.

Improve your super-ultra guns to beat difficult enemies and destroy the lab of dr. Zlatous. The talent tree allows you to adjust the gameplay according to your needs and preferences. Engage in melee or strike foes down from afar? Or maybe you want to use traps instead? Your choice.
Every region has a Warden, its mind corrupted by the mad scientist. Fighting such a creature may prove challenging.

name: Funny Bunny Gun

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760M
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: The game is a cartoon-style Metroidvania. Explore winding mazes, ancient temples, and fiery caves. Fight in fast-paced battles against aggressive oversized vegetables and mutant beetles. Gear up with customizable guns to stop the inhumane experiments of a mad scientist!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
